name: The Beehive Project
body:
### Welcome to Beehive.
Beehive is a distributed programming framework in [Go](http://golang.org/).

### Docs
* [User Guide](https://github.com/kandoo/beehive/blob/master/Docs/guide.md)
* [API](https://godoc.org/github.com/kandoo/beehive)

### Discuss
Ask questions and provide feedback on [beehive-dev](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/beehive-dev).

### Projects Using Beehive
* [Beehive SDN Controller](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/beehive-dev) with support for OpenFlow
* [Beehive Examples](https://github.com/kandoo/beehive/tree/master/examples)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
